meanings.definition: A quality or property that distinguishes or identifies something.
meanings.sent1: The quale of kindness in her actions was evident to everyone.
meanings.sent2: The unique quale of her voice made her stand out in the choir.
meanings.sent3: His quale for always arriving late became a running joke among his friends.
meanings.sent4: The quale of determination in her eyes was like a blazing fire.
meanings.sent5: The quale of honesty in his words was as clear as a crystal stream.

meanings.definition: A characteristic or feature that defines the nature of something.
meanings.sent1: The quale of loyalty in a friend is priceless.
meanings.sent2: The defining quale of a good leader is the ability to inspire others.
meanings.sent3: The quale of a sweet tooth led her to always choose dessert first.
meanings.sent4: The quale of courage in his heart shone brighter than any star.
meanings.sent5: The quale of curiosity in her mind drove her to explore new places.

meanings.definition: An individual instance or example of a quality or property.
meanings.sent1: This quale of a painting perfectly captures the artist's emotions.
meanings.sent2: The quale of a single rose can express more than a thousand words.
meanings.sent3: The quale of a clumsy moment turned into a hilarious memory.
meanings.sent4: The quale of a shooting star reminded her to always dream big.
meanings.sent5: The quale of a warm hug can make even the toughest day better.
